title: A randomized controlled trial to study the efficacy of sulfasalazine for axial disease in ankylosing spondylitis
abstract: To evaluate efficacy of sulfasalazine for axial ankylosing spondylosis.
explanation: The hypothesis in this paper is inspired by the findings of the source paper, as it evaluates the efficacy of sulfasalazine for axial ankylosing spondylosis, a specific aspect of ankylosing spondylitis that was not found to be significantly improved by sulfasalazine in the source paper.
